title.narrative: DRC Emergency Urban and Social Rehabilitation Project

description.narrative: To respond to urgent challenges by: (i) supporting domestic debt settlement; and (ii) addressing urgent rehabilitation and social needs in targeted areas.

condition.narrative: The Recipient shall have an audit of delivery of funds for each School Operating Expenditures Installment carried out no laterthan6 0 days after each release of funds under Part A of the Project.
The Recipient shall have an audit of the payment of each Internal Debt Tranche made under Part B of the Project no later than 45day s after each payment of each tranche.
The Recipient shall maintain a FMS in accordance with provisions of 4.09 of the General Conditions.
The Recipient shall prepare and furnish no later than 45 days after the end of each Q, interim unaudited financial reports for theP roject.
